commit_message:
Do not assert whether domain name starts with 'PF'

This is to be able to use add_hmmsearch_to_gff.py with motifs other than
Pfam

Do not copy key from gmes tar since newer versions do not have it. We
assume the user has already installed the key

Merge pull request #1 from glaParaBio/galba

Combine braker2 with galba. Code for miniprot may be removed
Combine braker2 with galba. Code for miniprot may be removed
Integration of reference proteins (spaln) clustered into genes (gffread)
Fix mapping of Pfam domains spliced across exons
Add CHANGELOG.md (see that fo main changes)

Fix bug in name of one of orthodb files. Refactor download of orthodb
download rule
Prevent race condition when RepeatMasker creates databases

Add gene_id to features; `scripts/extractGoFromGff.py` not used yet; minor
edits

Extract files from dummy folder

These files and their history transferred from private repository

1) Annotate Marija's genome with updated workflow 2) Analysis of
   intermediate contigs
Add missing dependency pigz; remove invalid --clean-names
